review: The lack of support for mirroring really makes this product inferior to the Chromecast.  I was hoping to upgrade my chromecast with this device which has better hardware, but find myself going back and not using the Stick.

review: It works faster than my Roku, and doesn't get as hot. However, i haven't been able to project my phone video on my TV like i can with the Roku! The Amazon Pime seems like a joke to me, any movie i look for still has a rental price and the youtube stuff about how to hack into it doesn't work unless i'm doing it wrong. Which could be, i'm not fluent with electronics anymore. Definately better than cable or satellite though. I cancelled my tv and only watch through my fire stick.
